translation.en: [Jake] My generation, we were born into war.
translation.fr: Ma génération est née dans un monde en guerre.

translation.en: Giant monsters attacked our world.
translation.fr: Des monstres géants attaquaient notre monde.

translation.en: [Jake] We called them Kaiju.
They came through the Breach.
translation.fr: Ils étaient sortis par la Brèche,

translation.en: A gateway to another dimension at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean.
translation.fr: un portail vers une autre dimension, au fond de l'océan Pacifique,

translation.en: They were sent by an alien race on the other side,
translation.fr: envoyés par des êtres d'un autre monde,

translation.en: the Precursors.
We fought back,
building our own monsters.
Jaegers, giant robots.
So big, they needed two pilots to run 'em.
translation.fr: si grands qu'il leur fallait deux pilotes.

translation.en: My father was one of 'em.
He sacrificed himself to help save the world.
translation.fr: Il s'est sacrifié pour sauver le monde.

translation.en: I am not my father.
translation.fr: Moi, je suis pas mon père.

translation.en: It's been 10 years since we won the war and closed the Breach.
translation.fr: Il y a 10 ans, on a gagné la guerre et colmaté la Brèche.

translation.en: Most of the world's recovered.
translation.fr: Le monde s'est en partie relevé... L'ESSOR DU SECTEUR DU BÂTIMENT RELANCE L'ÉCONOMIE MONDIALE

translation.en: But a few coastal cities never did.
And the world is still picking up the pieces.
translation.fr: et il continue de se reconstruire.

translation.en: But some of us live better in a broken world.
And squatting in half a mansion
translation.fr: On préfère squatter un demi-palace que de louer un appart pourri.

translation.en: is better than paying for some crappy apartment.
translation.fr: un demi-palace que de louer un appart pourri.

translation.en: Now, in the relief zones, you have to get creative.
translation.fr: Dans les zones sinistrées, faut être créatif.

translation.en: You have to hustle, or somebody else might eat your breakfast.
translation.fr: Faut être roublard pour défendre son petit-déj'

translation.en: -And your cookies. -[sniffing]
And your damn hot sauce.
You know, out here, we place a different value on things.
translation.fr: Ici, les choses ont une autre valeur.

translation.en: The Pan Pacific Defense Corps usually looks the other way
translation.fr: Le Corps de Défense Pan Pacific ferme les yeux

translation.en: as long as you don't go poking around where you don't belong.
translation.fr: tant qu'on va pas fureter où il faut pas,

translation.en: Say, like a decommissioned Jaeger scrapyard.
translation.fr: comme dans une casse de jaegers hors service. CASSE DE JAEGERS HORS SERVICE

translation.en: Big risks mean big reward.
And nothing pays more than stolen Jaeger tech.
translation.fr: en particulier le vol de technologie jaeger.

translation.en: Plenty of nutcases out here trying to slap together their own Jaegers.
translation.fr: Un tas de barjos veulent se bricoler un jaeger.

translation.en: But they need the parts to do it.
translation.fr: Mais ils ont besoin de pièces.

translation.en: So if you can steal what no one else can steal,
translation.fr: Alors si on vole des trucs recherchés,

translation.en: you can live like a king.
[Sonny] Are you sure it's in here?
[Jake] Power cores are stripped before they get decommissioned.
translation.fr: Les noyaux d'énergie sont toujours retirés,

translation.en: But sometimes they miss the tertiary plasma capacitors.
translation.fr: mais il reste parfois des accumulateurs plasma.

translation.en: And that's a big score. This one's still holding a charge.
translation.fr: Et gros coup de bol : il est encore chargé.

translation.en: You better hope so.
Let's just calm down. Let's not get excited.
I'm just playing the odds here. You cheated Barada in Juarez, skipped out on Chau in Hong Kong.
translation.fr: Je joue la prudence. T'as arnaqué Barada et planté Chow.

translation.en: Now that was a misunderstanding.
And stole from me in my own backyard.
translation.fr: Et t'es venu me voler chez moi.

translation.en: Now I'm stealing for you. Circle of life.
translation.fr: Là, je vole pour toi. "C'est l'histoire de la vie". On est quittes ?

translation.en: We good?
translation.fr: "C'est l'histoire de la vie". On est quittes ?

translation.en: You deliver,
and, yeah, we're good.
translation.fr: et bien sûr, on sera quittes.

translation.en: Let's get rich.
Let's.
-[device beeps] -[electronic voice] Target lock.
[Sonny] Where is it?
Hey, man, uh, just a little situation.
translation.fr: Écoute, y a un petit problème.

translation.en: It says it's here, it's supposed to be right there,
translation.fr: La balise indique ici, juste là-bas.

translation.en: but you know what, let me just figure this out.
-Target lock. -[coughs]
Somebody please kill this guy for me.
Target moving.
-[gun cocks] -No, no, no. It's here.
You, wait, wait! Someone else is in here.
translation.fr: Attendez. Quelqu'un a piqué l'accumulateur. Venez !

translation.en: Someone else has the capacitor.
-Now, let's go. Come on. -Jake!
translation.fr: Quelqu'un a piqué l'accumulateur. Venez ! Jake !

translation.en: [Sonny] Jake! Hey, wait!
You son of a...
[Sonny] Split up. Go!
[Sonny] Come on, Jake!
[man] Hey, boss, he went over here!
translation.fr: Chef, il est parti par là.

translation.en: [man] I see him. I see him.
Nice try.
-Jake! -We're good.
[Sonny in muffled voice] Jake, you son of a...
[electronic voice] Target lock.
[Jake] Hey! Get back here with that!
Target moving.
-How old are you? -Old enough to kick your ass.
Let's take a second. Back up.
You build this thing yourself?
What do you think?
I think I can sell your little toy for a whole lot of money.
translation.fr: Je peux le vendre cher, ton joujou.

translation.en: Scrapper's not a toy, and she's not for sale.
translation.fr: Scrapper est ni un jouet ni à vendre !

translation.en: The man holding the pipe says she is. So listen up...
translation.fr: Le mec avec la barre dit que si, alors écoute.

translation.en: You led them here?
-That's impossible. -[grunts]
[Jake] Ah, what the hell, man.
[Amara] Come on, come on, come on!
Yes! It works!
Whoa, whoa, whoa! Hey! Get out.
What are you doing? No, no, no.
[Jake] Where is it? [Amara] Stop! Hey!
Don't touch that. Hey!
What are you doing? Stop!
-Where's the other one? -The other what?
The other cradle. A Jaeger needs two pilots.
Scrapper is small enough to run on a single neural lobe.
translation.fr: L'autre poste de pilotage. Une seule charge neuronale suffit.

translation.en: All right, then you get out, and you let me pilot.
Get out!
Screw that.
-Told you she's not a toy. -You're gonna get us killed.
translation.fr: C'est pas un jouet. C'est dangereux, je vais le faire.

translation.en: -I can get us out of here. -I just got us out.
translation.fr: C'est dangereux, je vais le faire. Je maîtrise !

translation.en: Oh, my God.
That's November Ajax.
[Ajax pilot] Pilots of unregistered Jaeger,
this is the Pan Pacific Defense Corps.
translation.fr: ici le Corps de Défense Pan Pacific.

translation.en: Power down and exit your Conn-Pod.
translation.fr: Coupez les circuits et sortez du cockpit.

translation.en: No, no, no. Don't, don't, don't. Don't give up.
You give up way too easy.
That's what they think. [grunts]
[Ajax pilot] Stop.
You're in violation of Code 10 Section 14.
Operation of an unregistered Jaeger.
-Hang on. -I am hanging on!
Hang tighter.
[Ajax pilot] Seriously?
Stop.
[Amara] See?
I just out-piloted November Ajax.
No, you didn't.
Did.
Didn't.
Okay. What do you got? And I'm not getting out.
translation.fr: T'as un plan ? Je reste où je suis.

translation.en: One of those ion cells redundant?
translation.fr: - T'as une pile ionique en trop ? - Non.

translation.en: -No! -They are now.
translation.fr: - T'as une pile ionique en trop ? - Non. - Tant pis. - On en a besoin.

translation.en: -But we need them. -Get up to Ajax's head.
translation.fr: - Tant pis. - On en a besoin. Grimpe sur la tête d'Ajax.

translation.en: -What? -Go!
[electronic voice] Low power warning. Twelve percent.
I told you we needed that!
It worked, didn't it?
[electronic voice] Eleven percent.
How long before Ajax can reboot his systems?
translation.fr: Combien de temps avant qu'Ajax redémarre ?

translation.en: About that long.
[Ajax pilot] Power down.
This is your final warning.
[Ajax pilot] All right, let's go.
Look what you did to my Jaeger, you jerk!
Should have let me pilot.
Oh, like this is my fault?
You compromised my command center.
translation.fr: T'as grillé mon poste de commandement.

translation.en: Wow. Your command center?
-Yes. My command center. -Wait. Sorry, I didn't hear that.
-Your command center? -Yes!
And you had no place to come in and try to tell me what to do.
translation.fr: Qui t'a autorisé à entrer et à me commander ?

translation.en: I go wherever I want. It's a different world.
'Cause it really worked out well, right? Look where we're at.
translation.fr: On a vu ce que ça donnait !

translation.en: Your top lip and your bottom lip, they need to meet and become friends.
Smart. That's a good one.
They need to close up, all right? Shut up.
-Shut up. Conversation done. -Yeah, I can.
translation.fr: Referme-les. Boucle-la. - Fin de la discussion. - Bien.

translation.en: Good.
Junkyard baby.
Why did you build it? What happened to the shutting up?
translation.fr: - Pourquoi tu l'as construit ? - Je la boucle plus ?

translation.en: You said you wasn't gonna sell it, so what the hell was you gonna do?
translation.fr: S'il est pas à vendre, c'est pour faire quoi ?

translation.en: Rob a bank or something?
I built her because one day, they're gonna come back.
translation.fr: Je l'ai construit parce qu'ils vont revenir.

translation.en: The Kaiju.
And when they do, I'm not gonna be stuck
waiting for someone else to come save my ass.
translation.fr: Comme ça, j'attendrai pas qu'on vienne me sauver.

translation.en: Not like before.
You. Let's go.
Hello, Jake.
Here we are again.
Look, it's just a stretch of bad luck. I'll figure it out.
translation.fr: Je joue de malchance, mais ça va aller.

translation.en: Father used to say we make our own luck.
translation.fr: Père disait que la chance se provoque.

translation.en: Yeah, well, Dad said a lot of things.
You were arrested in a rogue Jaeger.
Hold on a second. That wasn't my Jaeger. There's this little kid.
translation.fr: Attends, c'était pas le mien. Cette gamine...

translation.en: -She's about this tall... -You have priors.
This is serious.
That's why I need my big sis to help me get the hell out of here.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que ma grande sœur va m'aider à sortir d'ici.

translation.en: Just one last time.
They are not going to let you just walk.
translation.fr: Ils ne vont pas te relâcher,

translation.en: But there might be another way.
translation.fr: mais il y a peut-être une alternative.

translation.en: Okay. See, that's what I wanna hear. That's what I'm here to talk about, the other way.
translation.fr: C'est de ça qu'il faut parler, de cette alternative.

translation.en: Lay it on me. What do I gotta do?
Re-enlist and finish what you started.
I'm not doing that. Look, I'm too old to be a cadet.
translation.fr: Je suis trop vieux pour être cadet.

translation.en: I don't want you to be a cadet.
I want you to help train them.
Train who? Train what? I'm not training no damn kids.
translation.fr: Pour former qui ? Pas des gamins !

translation.en: The transport is standing by to bring both of you to Moyulan.
translation.fr: Un véhicule vous conduira tous les deux à Moyulan.

translation.en: Both of us?
You and your new recruit.
Mako.
I can't believe she just hologrammed me.
[Jake] Yeah, look. I didn't have a choice.
translation.fr: Tu sais, j'ai pas eu le choix.

translation.en: [Amara] I know, I get it. But why me?
translation.fr: J'ai bien compris, mais pourquoi moi ?

translation.en: Why do they want me for the program?
You built and piloted your own Jaeger. These people like that kind of stuff.
translation.fr: Tu as construit et piloté ton jaeger, ça leur plaît.

translation.en: Okay, so then why am I just a cadet, and you get to be a ranger?
translation.fr: Alors pourquoi je suis cadet et toi, ranger ?

translation.en: Oh, my God.
That... That is Valor Omega!
Scrapper!
You gotta be kidding me.
I didn't believe it when they told me you were inbound.
translation.fr: Je pensais pas que tu viendrais.

translation.en: How you doing, Nate? It's Ranger Lambert.
Are you having a laugh?
This is a military base.
translation.fr: Sur une base militaire, c'est comme ça,

translation.en: You remember how that works, Ranger Pentecost.
translation.fr: Sur une base militaire, c'est comme ça, ranger Pentecost.

translation.en: And you must be Amara Namani.
Yes, sir. Ranger, sir.
Well, let's get you squared away.
Oh, and, uh, try not to steal anything while you're here.
translation.fr: Et tâche de ne rien voler pendant ton séjour ici.

translation.en: Did that haircut just call you Pentecost?
As in badass Stacker Pentecost?
Pilot of Coyote Tango, hero of basically the whole world?
translation.fr: pilote de Coyote Tango et héros du monde entier ou presque ?

translation.en: It's just a name.
Yeah. A really cool name.
[Nate] Sim training starts at 0600.
You're late, you miss the day.
You fall behind, you'll be on the next transport back to wherever they found you.
translation.fr: Si tu rames trop, tu repars direct d'où tu viens.

translation.en: That's Titan Redeemer!
And Bracer Phoenix!
She's a three-man rig!
Saber Athena!
I love Saber Athena!
She's the fastest Jaeger in the fleet. Did you know that?
translation.fr: C'est le plus rapide de tous.

translation.en: [woman over pa] Warning. Stand clear of lift.
Okay, so which one's yours?
You pilot Gipsy Avenger?
[Jules] He used to.
Until his co-pilot got a better offer in the private sector.
translation.fr: mais son copilote a opté pour le secteur privé.

translation.en: Jules Reyes. J-Tech.
Amara. Cadet.
Ranger, apparently.
Heard a lot about you, Pentecost.
You know you still hold the record?
-What record? -Shut up.
So how'd they lure you back? I mean, it couldn't have been the pay, so...
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui t'a incité à revenir ? Pas le salaire.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, it's a long story. But if you want to talk about it, we can meet up...
translation.fr: C'est une longue histoire. On pourrait en discuter...

translation.en: [Nate] She's busy.
Eyes front, Pentecost.
-Oh! Come on, Renata, not the face! -Sorry, man.
Raise you two shower chits.
translation.fr: Je relance de deux jetons de douche.

translation.en: Fold, Ilya. You need all the showers you can get, man.
I have a musk! What you smell is musk.
translation.fr: J'ai une odeur musquée, c'est tout.

translation.en: Ranger on deck!
[automated voice] Audio system deactivated.
Cadets, this is Amara Namani.
She'll be joining you in sim training bright and early.
And this is Ranger Pentecost.
He will be helping me instruct you
until I can find a new co-pilot to replace Ranger Burke.
translation.fr: le temps de remplacer le ranger Burke.

translation.en: Anything you'd like to add?
Nothing you wanna hear.
Malikova, get Namani squared away and prepped for training.
Yes, sir!
As you were.
We're gonna be trained by a Pentecost! [Viktoria] So?
translation.fr: - Un Pentecost va nous former ! - Et ?

translation.en: Not like he was the one who died helping close the Breach.
translation.fr: Lui, il est pas mort en colmatant la Brèche.

translation.en: He's never even been in combat.
Uh, hey. So where should I...
Heard you built your own little Jaeger. Yeah.
translation.fr: - Tu as construit un jaeger ? - Oui.

translation.en: Actually. Scrapper. I operated her, too, with this solo bay...
translation.fr: Il s'appelle Scrapper et il se pilote avec une seule...

translation.en: You want to put junk together, be a mechanic.
translation.fr: Si tu veux bricoler, t'as qu'à être mécano.

translation.en: Moyulan is for pilots.
Hey, come on. I got ya.
-Thanks. -Yeah.
So you and Vik already buddies, huh?
-Vik? -[Suresh] It's short for Viktoria.
translation.fr: - Déjà copine avec Vik ? - Vik ? Viktoria, mais prononce pas ce nom.

translation.en: But you don't want to call her that.
translation.fr: Viktoria, mais prononce pas ce nom.

translation.en: Yeah. What's her problem?
Took her three shots to pass the entrance test.
translation.fr: Elle a passé trois fois le concours.

translation.en: Yeah. Don't think she likes how you landed here.
It's not my fault. Recruiters never come around back home.
translation.fr: C'est pas ma faute si personne vient recruter chez moi.

translation.en: Hey, know any Russian?
No.
I'll teach you some. Calms her down.
Come on. Let's get you squared away.
[electronic voice] Hemispheres out of alignment.
We need to reconnect!
I know! I'm trying!
[electronic voice] MAGLEV deactivated.
[Amara] I just can't get this.
[Suresh] That sucked.
[electronic voice] Drift simulation terminated.
You know, when I heard you gave November Ajax a run for his money...
translation.fr: Quand tu as résisté à November Ajax,

translation.en: I thought we might have something here.
translation.fr: je me suis pris à rêver,

translation.en: -[laughs] -Now, I'm not so sure.
How am I supposed to drift in this thing?
It smells like feet.
I didn't ask for your excuses, Cadet.
You putting her up against Kaiju that almost killed veteran pilots,
translation.fr: L'opposer à un kaiju qui a brisé de vrais pilotes,

translation.en: doesn't make any sense.
Maybe she's not the only one that doesn't belong here.
translation.fr: D'autres n'ont pas leur place ici.

translation.en: See, Nate, I know you have a problem with me.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu m'aimes pas,

translation.en: But come on. She's just a kid.
So were we. That's the point.
translation.fr: Comme nous à l'époque, c'est le but.

translation.en: You make stronger connections when you're young.
translation.fr: On se connecte mieux quand on est jeunes.

translation.en: And that kind of bond makes for a better drift pilot.
translation.fr: Et avec ce lien, on dérive mieux.

translation.en: Yeah. I remember the pitch.
Thanks.
Ryoichi, Renata, you're up.
Show our new recruit how it's done.
What the hell are you wearing?
Jules loves it.
Yeah, she told me it's nice to finally have someone with style around here.
translation.fr: Voir un mec stylé ici, ça lui plaît.

translation.en: Can't blame the girl. I'm sexy.
-[Nate] Hmm. Yeah. -Want a drink?
[sighs] Sure.
Thanks.
Ice cream's up top.
So one more time around, huh? To prove your old man wrong?
translation.fr: Tu as rempilé pour donner tort à ton vieux ?

translation.en: Nah, I just came back to see if your chin implant ever settled in.
translation.fr: Non, pour vérifier ton implant au menton.

translation.en: Well, I think it's settled in quite nicely.
Yeah. It's very commanding. Kids must love it.
translation.fr: Oui, impressionnant. Les jeunes doivent kiffer.

translation.en: -Jake, these kids, they look up to us. -Mmm-hmm.
We gotta show them that we can work together.
translation.fr: On doit leur montrer qu'on fait équipe.

translation.en: Well, the war ended 10 years ago, man. You just need to let that go. Just, woosah.
translation.fr: La guerre est finie depuis 10 ans. Tourne la page, lâche prise.

translation.en: You have to understand your enemy's...
Sorry, mate.
You have to understand your enemy's objective to know you've defeated them.
translation.fr: Il faut comprendre le but de l'ennemi avant de crier victoire,

translation.en: We still don't.
No. I can help you out with that.
See, I'm thinking it has something to do with them sending giant monsters to kick the crap out of us.
translation.fr: Ils ont envoyé des monstres géants pour nous dérouiller.

translation.en: No, no, no. The Precursors wouldn't send Kaiju
translation.fr: Non, les Précurseurs ne se seraient pas contentés de ça s'ils comptaient nous éradiquer.

translation.en: to flatten a few cities if they were trying to wipe us all out.
translation.fr: ne se seraient pas contentés de ça s'ils comptaient nous éradiquer.

translation.en: All right, look, Nate, I don't have a problem with you, man. But I had to make a choice.
translation.fr: Nate, j'ai rien contre toi, mais j'ai dû choisir

translation.en: It was between your pretty face and prison.
translation.fr: entre ton joli minois et la prison.

translation.en: I chose your pretty face.
Oh, well, I'm touched.
How many damn toppings do you need?
Leave my toppings be, man. Don't mess with my damn toppings.
translation.fr: Critique pas mes toppings. Pas touche !

translation.en: So the cadets got like, what, a couple of months before they graduate?
translation.fr: Les cadets finissent quand ? Dans deux ou trois mois ?

translation.en: -Six. -Okay.
I tell you what.
Every time you want to say something soldiery to them, I'll just nod.
translation.fr: Quand tu les recadreras, je hocherai la tête

translation.en: Or like, "Yep, what he said."
Then before you know it, they get to be pilots.
translation.fr: Dès qu'ils seront pilotes, je reprendrai ma vie.

translation.en: -I get to get back to my life. -Great.
translation.fr: Dès qu'ils seront pilotes, je reprendrai ma vie. Super.

translation.en: Boom.
It may happen sooner than you think.
How so?
Big dog and pony show tomorrow.
Shao and her team are presenting this new drone program they have.
translation.fr: Shao et son équipe présentent leur projet de drones.

translation.en: Could make us all obsolete.
Sounds like my get-out-of-jail-free card.
You know, you can front all you want,
translation.fr: Tu sais, tu as beau jouer les caïds,

translation.en: but you and I both know you could've been great.
Ms. Shao. Marshal Quan.
translation.fr: Mme Shao, je suis le marshal Quan.

translation.en: It's an honor to meet you.
Sorry.
She doesn't do the whole hand shaking thing.
translation.fr: elle ne serre jamais la main.

translation.en: Dr. Newton Geiszler. Head of research and development for Shao Industries.
translation.fr: Dr Newton Geiszler, chef de projet R&D, Shao Industries.

translation.en: -That's a nice firm grip you got there. -[all speaking Mandarin]
translation.fr: Voilà une bonne poignée de main bien ferme.

translation.en: Hand hard very shake.
Gratitude for having us.
Ranger Lambert and I will get you set up ma'am.
translation.fr: Si vous voulez bien nous suivre.

translation.en: That's a much better look on you.
translation.fr: Je te préfère dans cette tenue.

translation.en: Guess it's better than prison stripes. Barely.
translation.fr: C'est mieux qu'un uniforme rayé, et encore.

translation.en: [laughs] I'm sorry, is this him? It's gotta be him, right?
translation.fr: Excusez-moi, c'est lui ? Vous êtes le fils de Stacker, non ?

translation.en: You're Stacker's kid. Hey, I'm Newt.
translation.fr: Vous êtes le fils de Stacker, non ?

translation.en: I was a big fan of your father's.
translation.fr: Moi, c'est Newt. J'admirais votre père.

translation.en: Amazing speech writer, by the way. Did you ever hear his one where he canceled the apocalypse?
translation.fr: J'adorais ses discours, comme celui sur l'apocalypse.

translation.en: Newton!
-Hermann... -I was hoping you'd be tagging along.
translation.fr: Hermann ! Puisque tu es là, j'aurais besoin d'aide sur une expérience.

translation.en: I could use your help on an experiment I'm working on.
translation.fr: Puisque tu es là, j'aurais besoin d'aide sur une expérience.

translation.en: Now, this will only take a moment. I know how busy you are.
translation.fr: Ce ne sera pas long, je sais que tu es occupé.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Don't want to impose, but...
[Newton] Ah, come on, you can't impose on me.
I mean, we've been inside each other's heads, right?
translation.fr: On a vu dans nos têtes respectives,

translation.en: We've saved the world!
We've drifted with a Kaiju!
translation.fr: et on a dérivé avec un kaiju.

translation.en: If we hadn't yanked that intel out of that Kaiju's brain,
translation.fr: On a soutiré des infos à ce cerveau de kaiju

translation.en: Raleigh would've never been able to close the Breach.
translation.fr: et Raleigh a colmaté la Brèche.

translation.en: Now that was you! And that was me!
translation.fr: C'est grâce à toi et à moi.

translation.en: Technically more me, but any chance we could make this quick, or...
translation.fr: Surtout à moi. Tu peux te dépêcher ?

translation.en: Um... Deployment.
-Huh? -Of Jaegers.
Deploying them into battle, it takes too much time.
translation.fr: Envoyer l'armada prend trop de temps

translation.en: The amount of damage a Kaiju can inflict before they've...
translation.fr: Envoyer l'armada prend trop de temps et les dégâts causés par un kaiju...

translation.en: Ah, here. I think I've found a solution.
translation.fr: Voilà. Je pense avoir la solution.

translation.en: Hermann, you know I can never read your...
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais réussi à lire tes...

translation.en: Rocket thrusters, huh?
No. There's no fuel in the world with that kind of boost-to-mass ratio.
translation.fr: Non, aucun carburant au monde n'a ce rapport masse/poussée.

translation.en: From this world.
No.
Is that Kaiju blood?
Exactly!
I've discovered Kaiju blood is highly reactive
translation.fr: Le sang de kaiju est hautement réactif

translation.en: when it's combined with rare earth elements. Cerium, lanthanum, gadolinium.
translation.fr: avec certaines terres rares : cérium, lanthane, gadolinium.

translation.en: I realize that, pal. Okay.
translation.fr: Je comprends, vieux, mais joue pas avec ça,

translation.en: You can't be fooling around with this stuff. You're gonna blow yourself up.
translation.fr: Je comprends, vieux, mais joue pas avec ça, ça peut exploser.

translation.en: Now, no one knows more about Kaiju morphology than you!
translation.fr: Tu es expert en morphologie de kaiju.

translation.en: If you could just take a look, please. No, Hermann, I gotta stop you.
Look, none of this matters.
Once my boss's drones are approved, deployment time, that's gonna be a non-issue.
translation.fr: Si nos drones sont validés, le déploiement sera rapide.

translation.en: Within a year, buddy, we're gonna have drones everywhere.
translation.fr: D'ici un an, il y aura des drones partout.

translation.en: So you won't help me?
Look, why don't we talk about it over dinner at my place? Okay? You can finally meet Alice.
translation.fr: Viens dîner un soir, on en reparlera. Je te présenterai Alice.

translation.en: I don't need a hot meal, Newton. What I need is a solution to a very specific problem.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas besoin d'un repas, mais d'une solution.

translation.en: Ah, that's me, bud. I'm sorry. Duty calls. It's been nice catching up.
translation.fr: Je bipe, le devoir m'appelle. Ravi de t'avoir revu.

translation.en: I still get nightmares
about what we saw
translation.fr: à propos de ce qu'on a vu

translation.en: when we drifted with that disgusting Kaiju brain.
translation.fr: quand on a dérivé avec cet immonde cerveau de kaiju.

translation.en: But it was a hell of a rush, wasn't it?
Dr. Geiszler. Time to go.
translation.fr: Dr Geiszler, il faut y aller.

translation.en: Okay, okay.
You and Dr. Gottlieb were close, weren't you? During the war?
translation.fr: Vous étiez proche du Dr Gottlieb durant la guerre, non ?

translation.en: We shared lab yes okay...
Speak English. Your Mandarin makes you sound like an idiot.
translation.fr: Parlez anglais. En mandarin, vous faites demeuré.

translation.en: I know, I'm terrible. Uh, yes, we shared a lab together.
translation.fr: Je suis nul. Oui, nous partagions un labo.

translation.en: What were you and Dr. Gottlieb talking about?
Some crazy idea he had about thruster pods on a Jaeger.
translation.fr: De son projet farfelu de propulseur de jaeger.

translation.en: Until Secretary General Mori makes her recommendation at the Council Summit, I can't afford a misstep.
translation.fr: En attendant l'aval de Mme Mori, nous devons éviter tout faux pas.

translation.en: No more contact with him...
until after the vote.
The man's completely harmless.
Could you say that again and this time about 80% slower?
translation.fr: Vous pourriez répéter ça, mais cette fois, 80 % plus lentement ?

translation.en: [in English] I said, don't make me question your loyalty. Understand?
translation.fr: J'ai dit : "Ne me faites pas douter de votre loyauté." Compris ?

translation.en: What's to question?
-I barely talk to the guy anyway. -[speaking in Mandarin]
translation.fr: Je lui ai à peine parlé.

translation.en: Then it won't be a problem.
And work on your Mandarin.
I don't like to repeat myself.
In any language.
[in English] My drones are the next step in Jaeger evolution.
translation.fr: Mes drones sont l'avenir de l'évolution jaeger.

translation.en: The system I designed processes commands through a quantum data core.
translation.fr: Mon système traite les commandes par un cœur à données quantiques.

translation.en: This means that a single pilot
can operate the drone remotely
translation.fr: peut commander le drone à distance,

translation.en: from anywhere in the world.
As soon as the council approves deployment
translation.fr: Quand le Conseil votera le déploiement,

translation.en: based on Secretary General Mori's final report,
translation.fr: en fonction du rapport final de Mme Mori,

translation.en: the days of struggling to find and train drift compatible pilots
translation.fr: le recrutement et la formation de pilotes compatibles

translation.en: will be a thing of the past.
And you think a bunch of desk jockeys are better than us?
translation.fr: Des geeks seront meilleurs que nous ?

translation.en: We are not here to shut you down.
translation.fr: Nous ne voulons pas fermer vos bases.

translation.en: Cooperation between our programs has never been more vital.
translation.fr: La coopération entre nos programmes est fondamentale.

translation.en: If there are any questions.
We are pilots. Not a bunch of office workers!
And now we're shouting. There's no need to shout.
translation.fr: Et voilà que ça crie. Faut pas.

translation.en: [Jake] That was slick.
So how long until all this is shut down, so I can go home?
translation.fr: La base fermera quand ? Je veux rentrer chez moi.

translation.en: I don't trust the tech. Not yet at least.
translation.fr: Je me méfie encore de cette technologie.

translation.en: It looks pretty good to me.
Remote systems can be hacked or compromised.
translation.fr: Les systèmes à distance peuvent être hackés ou compromis.

translation.en: No, you've got the key vote, right? So there you go. It's your decision.
translation.fr: Tu as le dernier mot, la décision t'appartient.

translation.en: I wish I could just go ahead and approve them.
Nearly half the council is backing Liwen.
translation.fr: La moitié du Conseil soutient Liwen.

translation.en: They aren't going to like my decision.
translation.fr: Ma décision ne leur plaira pas.

translation.en: Who cares what they like and what they don't like?
translation.fr: On s'en fiche que ça leur plaise ou pas.

translation.en: I tell you what, I'm gonna go with you.
translation.fr: Tu sais quoi ? Je vais t'accompagner

translation.en: For moral support.
Plus I wanna get out of this place.
I'm glad you offered
because I already requested Gipsy Avenger as honor guard at the Council Summit.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà demandé Gipsy Avenger comme garde au sommet du Conseil.

translation.en: You know Gipsy's Nate's ride.
His co-pilot works for Liwen now. He needs a new one.
translation.fr: Son copilote travaille pour Liwen, il en cherche un autre.

translation.en: One that you already know is drift compatible.
translation.fr: Un qu'on sait déjà compatible pour la dérive ?

translation.en: All right.
I'll do it. I got your back.
But I wanna be there when you tell Nate because I just wanna see his face. He's gonna be so pissed.
translation.fr: Je veux voir la tête que fera Nate. Il va être furax.

translation.en: He's just gonna stand there like,
[in American accent] "Yeah, I don't think you belong in a Jaeger, Jake. Get out of my Jaeger.
translation.fr: "T'as rien à faire dans un jaeger, Jake. Dégage.

translation.en: I'm handsome and sexy."
He is handsome. He is sexy.
Thank you, Jake.
[news anchor 1] Welcome back. Lots of sunshine today to kick off our weekend.
translation.fr: Ravie de vous retrouver. Du soleil pour débuter le week-end... CORPS DE DÉFENSE PAN PACIFIC SOMMET DU CONSEIL

translation.en: [Peter Overton] Good afternoon, everyone.
Peter Overton broadcasting from the Nine Studios in Sydney...
translation.fr: en direct des studios Nine de Sydney... DE VIOLENTES MANIFESTATIONS ÉCLATENT À SYDNEY

translation.en: [news anchor 2] So far, police say at least 49 officers injured.
translation.fr: CONTRE LE PROGRAMME DE DRONES DU PPDC Selon le dernier bilan, 49 policiers auraient été blessés. VIOLENTES MANIFESTATIONS EN MARGE DU SOMMET

translation.en: [news anchor 3] Kaiju worshipers in black masks throwing bottles and rocks.
translation.fr: Les pro-kaijus masqués de noir lancent des projectiles. LES PRO-KAIJUS REJOIGNENT LES MANIFESTATIONS

translation.en: PPDC Security in riot gear are attempting to...
translation.fr: Les forces de sécurité du PPDC... LE JAEGER PORTE-DRAPEAU ARRIVE AU SOMMET DU PPDC

translation.en: [on radio] Gipsy Avenger, this is Marshal Quan.
translation.fr: Gipsy Avenger, ici le marshal Quan.

translation.en: All you have to do is stand there and look pretty.
translation.fr: Il s'agit d'une mission de parade.

translation.en: Stay focused, try not to fall over.
translation.fr: Restez concentrés et ne trébuchez pas.

translation.en: -Roger that, sir. -Go for drop.
In three, two, one. Drop!
Jake!
[electronic voice] Drift alignment unstable.
Relax. It's coming back to me.
-You sure? -Ion cells activated.
We're in each other's heads, remember?
translation.fr: On lit dans la tête de l'autre,

translation.en: So I'd appreciate it if you'd stop thinking about Jules.
translation.fr: alors arrête de penser à Jules.

translation.en: Not gonna happen.
How about you stop thinking about kicking my ass?
translation.fr: Toi, tu penses me mettre une raclée ?

translation.en: -Not gonna happen either. -[scoffs]
-Gonna be a long day. -[speaking in Mandarin]
Hemispheres are calibrated, sir.
Neural handshake is weak, but holding.
[electronic voice] Incoming transport.
[woman on radio] Your ETA to zero is two minutes.
-[electronic voice] Warning. -Gipsy to Command. You reading this?
translation.fr: Gipsy à PC, vous captez ça ?

translation.en: Gipsy, this is Command.
Be advised. We have a rogue Jaeger.
[Nate] Pilots of unregistered Jaeger,
power down and exit your Conn-Pod immediately.
translation.fr: coupez les circuits et sortez du cockpit.

translation.en: I repeat. Power down, and exit your Conn-Pods now.
translation.fr: Je répète : coupez les circuits et sortez du cockpit.

translation.en: Missiles fired!
-[electronic voice] Low power warning. -We're losing power!
Jake! That Jaeger's power reading is...
translation.fr: Jake, ce jaeger a les mêmes données...

translation.en: It's jamming our comms!
-Nate! -Power's up!
Oh, shit.
-What do we do? -Follow my lead!
Mako's hit!
She's going down! We've gotta move!
Activating gravity sling!
Mayday! Mayday! Mayday! This is Mike, Mike, Charlie, 0-5-2.
We have been hit, and we are going down!
translation.fr: on est touchés, on va s'écraser !

translation.en: [electronic voice] Sending.
Mako!
Jake! Wait!
[electronic voice] Drift alignment failing.
[Amara] Come on, Sarah! Do something!
-Drift alignment failing. -You stupid brain thing!
So, I'm not really good at emotional stuff, but...
translation.fr: Je suis pas très douée pour exprimer mes sentiments,

translation.en: I really am sorry about your sister.
translation.fr: mais je suis désolée pour ta sœur.

translation.en: Half-sister?
Yeah, her family died during the Onibaba attack.
translation.fr: Sa famille a été tuée lors de l'attaque d'Onibaba.

translation.en: My dad took her in.
She was my sister. My family.
translation.fr: et c'était ma sœur, ma famille.

translation.en: Why are you out of uniform?
Just had a lot on my mind after Sydney.
translation.fr: J'ai pas mal gambergé après Sydney,

translation.en: I guess I just wanted to be comfortable.
Well, don't let Ranger Lambert see you in that.
He might take the stick out of his butt and beat you with it.
translation.fr: S'il te voit, ça va chier des bulles.

translation.en: I think I'm safe. It's wedged in there pretty tight.
translation.fr: Ça risque pas, il est trop constipé.

translation.en: So they're still using Sarah.
translation.fr: Ils se servent encore de Sarah ?

translation.en: Yeah. And I can't drift with her for some reason.
translation.fr: J'arrive pas à dériver avec elle.

translation.en: All the other cadets have been training for years, and I just...
translation.fr: Les autres s'entraînent depuis des années et je suis...

translation.en: I hate feeling like the slow kid.
You gotta relax.
translation.fr: Faut se détendre, sinon ça coince.

translation.en: Or you're just grinding gears. I'll help you out.
translation.fr: Faut se détendre, sinon ça coince. Je vais t'aider.

translation.en: -Got it, Coach. -Don't call me Coach.
All right, Sensei.
Concentrate.
We have to make a good connection. You can't do that if you're yappin' your gums.
translation.fr: Notre connexion sera pas bonne si tu jacasses.

translation.en: You ready?
Ready.
All right.
Let's see if we're drift compatible.
[Amara's father] Come on, Amara, get him!
[electronic voice] Neural load exceeding limit.
Stay focused, Amara.
Remember, the stronger your connection, the better you fight.
translation.fr: Rappelle-toi, plus le lien est fort, mieux on combat.

translation.en: That's it.
[Amara's father] Amara! Come on, jump! Jump to me, baby!
You have to, Amara, come on! Jump!
Amara! Don't hang on to the memory.
translation.fr: Amara, te cramponne pas à ce souvenir,

translation.en: Just let it flow right through you. Amara!
Amara! Jump in there!
Yeah, come on. Get together. Ready? One, two...
-Cheese! -[camera clicks]
Got it. Wanna see?
Wait a sec.
Amara. Amara, you need to let it go. Amara!
Look, just listen to my voice!
-Amara! -Daddy! Daddy!
Amara! Come on, jump!
-Amara! We need to break the drift! -Jump to me! Come on!
translation.fr: Amara, faut se déconnecter ! Saute, allez !

translation.en: I'm scared!
Baby, I will catch you! I promise. Come on!
-Amara! -[mother] Amara, come on!
Jump!
Amara! Take it off!
Are you okay?
I was there.
I felt it.
I felt it, too.
[Nate] Jake, it's me. Are you there?
Yeah, I'm here.
Meet me in the lab right away. Marshal wants to see us.
translation.fr: Le marshal nous attend au labo.

translation.en: All right. On my way.
You okay?
[Jake] What is it? [Marshal Quan] A message. From Mako.
translation.fr: - C'est quoi ? - Un message. De Mako.

translation.en: [Hermann] She was trying to send it from her copter right before it went down.
translation.fr: Elle essayait de l'envoyer depuis l'hélicoptère.

translation.en: It's a data package. High density.
translation.fr: Un paquet informatique de haute densité.

translation.en: Obsidian Fury was jamming comms.
How could her signal get through?
translation.fr: - Il est passé quand même ? - Non.

translation.en: It didn't. At least not intact.
translation.fr: - Il est passé quand même ? - Non. Pas tout à fait.

translation.en: So it's gone? [Hermann] "Gone" is relative in the digital realm.
translation.fr: - Il est perdu ? - C'est rare avec le numérique.

translation.en: By running a modified fractal algorithm,
translation.fr: Avec un algorithme fractal modifié, je dois pouvoir reconstruire

translation.en: I might be able to reconstruct a few megabytes.
translation.fr: Avec un algorithme fractal modifié, je dois pouvoir reconstruire quelques mégaoctets.

translation.en: There.
Is that a Kaiju?
I'm checking against PPDC Kaiju archives.
translation.fr: Comparons avec les kaijus référencés par le PPDC.

translation.en: No match against the database.
Keep looking. Whatever this is, it was important to her.
translation.fr: Continuez les recherches. Elle a jugé ça important.

translation.en: I want to know why.
And I want to know who was piloting that rogue Jaeger.
translation.fr: et je veux savoir qui pilotait ce jaeger.

translation.en: Hey. [chuckles] Sorry I'm late. -I thought you were still in Sydney. -[speaking in Mandarin]
translation.fr: Désolé du retard. Déjà de retour ?

translation.en: The council has approved Drone deployment in an emergency session.
translation.fr: Le Conseil a validé en urgence le déploiement des drones.

translation.en: That's great.
Thought you'd be a little more enthusiastic, doc.
Yeah, no, I'm pumped. This is great.
translation.fr: Je suis super content, c'est génial,

translation.en: It's just the timing of everything with the attack and all, feels a little...
translation.fr: mais ça tombe un peu mal, avec l'attaque...

translation.en: I was there. I know what happened.
translation.fr: J'y étais, je sais ce qui est arrivé.

translation.en: And it wouldn't have... If our Drones had been in the field.
translation.fr: Ça aurait pu être évité si nos drones avaient été présents.

translation.en: [electronic voice] Neural connection terminated.
Now everyone sees that.
-Yeah. Uh, I guess they do. -[speaking in Mandarin]
Which means the attack was positive...
all things considered.
If you look at it sideways, and you squint, then maybe you could say that. Uh...
translation.fr: Si on n'y regarde pas de trop près, on peut dire ça.

translation.en: -I'm sorry, what is going on here? -[speaking Mandarin]
The council expects full deployment in 48 hours.
translation.fr: On a 48 heures pour le déploiement complet.

translation.en: -[inhales sharply] Forty-eight is a... -[speaking Mandarin]
I've worked my whole life for this.
[in English] Get it done.
-That'll be fine. -[speaking Mandarin]
48 hours? No way we'll be ready.
You don't think there's a way?
All right, well, then you're fired. Okay? How about that?
Or maybe you're promoted. I don't know. We'll see how it goes.
Just get it done!
Give me this.
Hey, honey. I'm home.
Sorry I'm late. God, things were...
translation.fr: Je sais qu'il est tard, mais c'était...

translation.en: Things were crazy today with what happened in Sydney.
translation.fr: C'était la folie aujourd'hui avec l'attaque à Sydney.

translation.en: All those people, it was not pretty.
translation.fr: Tous ces pauvres gens, c'était pas beau à voir.

translation.en: My boss almost got killed. That could've been bad.
translation.fr: Ma patronne a frôlé la mort. L'horreur !

translation.en: Maybe. I guess, I don't know.
That would've been great actually, that one is all over me.
translation.fr: Ça aurait été plutôt bien, elle me gonfle. Sérieux, elle est toujours sur mon dos !

translation.en: I mean, I can't get a break from her!
translation.fr: Sérieux, elle est toujours sur mon dos !

translation.en: I'm ranting. Enough about work.
And enough about her, really, I should be focused on you.
translation.fr: Assez parlé d'elle. Je devrais penser à toi.

translation.en: How about we have a little fun in the bedroom?
translation.fr: Si on prenait du bon temps dans la chambre ?

translation.en: How was your day?
Oh, that's great. Yeah, that's exciting.
What's that?
A little pick-me-up? [chuckles]
Well, [clears throat] what can I say?
translation.fr: Que veux-tu que je te dise ?

translation.en: You read my mind.
translation.fr: Tu as lu dans mes pensées.

translation.en: [Amara] They're calling it Obsidian Fury.
There's never been a rogue like this.
News feed said they were posting a dozen Jaegers at the memorial.
translation.fr: Une dizaine de jaegers étaient à la cérémonie.

translation.en: When I die, I want that many to send me off.
translation.fr: Pour mes funérailles, j'en veux autant.

translation.en: Your pop's gonna make you work with boobs when you wash out.
translation.fr: Toi, plus tard, tu feras des seins.

translation.en: Jaegers do not show up when the boob guy dies.
translation.fr: Et aucun jaeger viendra pour toi.

translation.en: Wait, your dad works with boobs?
He's a plastic surgeon. He doesn't just work with...
I'm not gonna wash out. I'm gonna be a pilot.
translation.fr: Je lâcherai rien, je serai pilote.

translation.en: Still. You die, meh, I post one Jaeger at your funeral.
translation.fr: Si tu meurs, je t'enverrai un jaeger.

translation.en: -[laughs] -Maybe half a Jaeger.
I heard that's where they found Amara. In half a Jaeger.
translation.fr: Ils ont déniché Amara dans un demi-jaeger.

translation.en: It was a whole Jaeger.
It just wasn't very big...
translation.fr: Il était pas très grand, c'est tout,

translation.en: Bigger is better.
Kiss my ass.
What did you say?
Kiss my ass.
-Am I saying that right? -Yep.
I worked every day of my life to be here. You didn't do anything.
translation.fr: Moi, j'ai bûché pour être ici. T'as été ramassée dans la rue comme une ordure.

translation.en: You were just picked up off the street, like garbage!
translation.fr: T'as été ramassée dans la rue comme une ordure.

translation.en: You know where I learned that?
translation.fr: Tu sais où j'ai appris ça ?

translation.en: On the streets, you big, dumb...
translation.fr: Dans la rue, espèce de grande...

translation.en: Ranger on deck!
-She jumped me! -She doesn't belong here!
translation.fr: - C'est elle. - Elle a pas sa place !

translation.en: I don't care!
You know, when I first joined the Corps, I was just like you.
translation.fr: Vous savez, j'étais comme vous en arrivant ici.

translation.en: Worse. I was nobody.
But that woman we laid to rest today, Mako Mori,
translation.fr: Celle qu'on a enterrée, Mako Mori,

translation.en: she said, "Whoever you are,
the minute you enter this program, you join a family.
And no matter what they do,
no matter how stupid they may act sometimes,
translation.fr: s'il leur arrive de faire des choses débiles,

translation.en: you forgive 'em, and you move on."
So you start believing that. In here.
translation.fr: Si vous arrivez à y croire ici même,

translation.en: And you'll start believing it in a Jaeger.
translation.fr: vous y croirez dans le jaeger.

translation.en: Marshal's looking for you guys.
Says Gottlieb found something.
It isn't something. It's somewhere.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas quelque "chose", mais quelque "part".

translation.en: Severnaya Zemlya. Off Siberia's Taymyr Peninsula.
translation.fr: Severnaya Zemlya, en Sibérie, au large de la péninsule de Taïmyr.

translation.en: -What's in Zemlya? -Well, nothing anymore.
translation.fr: - Il y a quoi là-bas ? - Plus rien.

translation.en: A facility roughly in this location was used to manufacture Jaeger power cores earlier in the war,
translation.fr: Une ancienne usine qui fabriquait des noyaux de jaeger durant la guerre,

translation.en: but it was decommissioned years ago.
Why would Mako be trying to tell us about an abandoned factory
in the middle of nowhere?
Sir, permission to take Gipsy Avenger to see what the hell's out there.
translation.fr: Marshal, permission d'aller vérifier sur place avec Gipsy Avenger.

translation.en: [electronic voice] Scanning.
[sighs] Looks like Mako's message was a dead end.
translation.fr: Le message de Mako mène à une impasse.

translation.en: This place is abandoned.
No, wait a second.
I'm getting some weird readings.
-[alarm blaring] -Incoming!
Take out his legs!
-[alarm blaring] -We gotta get out of here!
Plasma cannon!
I think we pissed him off.
Good.
You remember our old move?
Hell yeah.
He looks hurt!
Go for his power core!
Warning.
[Jake] Pilots of Obsidian Fury,
get the hell out of your Conn-Pod.
What the hell is that?
It's definitely Kaiju.
A secondary brain used to control the hindquarters.
translation.fr: Un cerveau pour le train arrière.

translation.en: How'd they get into our world?
There hasn't been a breach in 10 years. Sensors would've picked it up.
translation.fr: Aucune brèche en 10 ans. On a des capteurs.

translation.en: I don't think there was a breach.
translation.fr: Je ne crois pas à une brèche. La chair de kaiju

translation.en: Kaiju flesh has a distinct radioactive half-life signature.
translation.fr: Je ne crois pas à une brèche. La chair de kaiju a une signature radioactive propre au Pré-Univers,

translation.en: Particular to the Anteverse.
translation.fr: a une signature radioactive propre au Pré-Univers,

translation.en: This specimen does not.
Okay, so, you're saying that it's from our universe?
translation.fr: Vous voulez dire qu'il vient de notre univers ?

translation.en: The genetic fingerprints indicate
distinctly terrestrial modification techniques,
translation.fr: des modifications terrestres sur de la chair de kaiju

translation.en: probably engineered from Kaiju flesh left over from the war.
translation.fr: des modifications terrestres sur de la chair de kaiju datant de la guerre.

translation.en: Precursors didn't do this.
translation.fr: Les Précurseurs n'y sont pour rien.

translation.en: Humans did.
Oh, my God. That hunk of slimy crap was piloting Obsidian Fury?
translation.fr: Incroyable. Ce truc visqueux pilotait Obsidian Fury ?

translation.en: -[Amara] We gotta get a look inside. -Inside?
That thing's part Kaiju.
translation.fr: Ce truc est à moitié kaiju.

translation.en: Come on, guys.
When are we ever gonna get a chance to see something like this again?
translation.fr: Une telle occase se représentera quand ?

translation.en: Never. Never would be good.
You guys can stay here. I'm going.
translation.fr: Vous restez ici ? Moi, j'y vais.

translation.en: [Suresh] Guys, guys, we should not be in here.
translation.fr: Sérieux, on devrait pas être ici.

translation.en: It's fused all the way through the system.
translation.fr: C'est fusionné sur tout le réseau.

translation.en: Like... Muscle tissue.
[Jinhai] That's how it was able to move like it did. Cool.
translation.fr: D'où ses mouvements hyper fluides. Cool !

translation.en: Yeah, cool.
Working with boobs is sounding better and better.
Shine your light over here.
What is it?
-I think it's some sort of... -[groaning]
Jinhai!
-I told you not to yank on those. -Go get help! Go!
translation.fr: Fallait pas y toucher. Allez chercher de l'aide !

translation.en: Man, we are so screwed!
This goes way past what she did. [Marshal Quan] The decision has been made.
translation.fr: - C'est exagéré. - La décision est prise.

translation.en: Security will take it from here. We're done.
translation.fr: La sécurité s'en charge. N'en parlons plus.

translation.en: Is Jinhai okay?
He's got some scarring, but, yeah, he'll live.
translation.fr: Il aura une cicatrice, c'est rien,

translation.en: Marshal put him on probation.
Meilin and Suresh, too. They blink wrong, all of 'em are out.
translation.fr: Meilin et Suresh sont aussi en sursis.

translation.en: No, it's not their fault. I talked them into it.
I'm sorry, I tried to talk to the Marshal,
but you're dismissed from the program.
Never belonged here anyway.
Really?
You know, I used to say the same thing a long time ago.
translation.fr: Je disais ça aussi à une époque.

translation.en: But I actually didn't wanna be here.
translation.fr: En fait, je voulais pas être ici.

translation.en: Still don't.
Why'd you sign up?
We were at war.
And my dad was leading the charge, and I thought maybe I could see more of him.
translation.fr: mon père dirigeait la bataille, je pensais le voir davantage

translation.en: Maybe even drift with him.
Well, one night, me and Nate got into it.
translation.fr: Un soir, je me suis battu avec Nate

translation.en: It was over something stupid. I can't even remember what.
translation.fr: pour un truc débile, j'ai déjà oublié quoi.

translation.en: So, I climbed in an old Mark IV,
translation.fr: Alors j'ai grimpé dans un vieux modèle 4

translation.en: just to show him I didn't need him to be a great pilot.
translation.fr: pour prouver que j'assurais tout seul.

translation.en: -That's pretty dumb. -Yeah.
translation.fr: C'était pas très malin. Je sais.

translation.en: How far did you get?
About seven steps. Take or leave.
translation.fr: J'ai fait sept pas, à peu près.

translation.en: How far did you get?
About two steps, and I blacked out from the strain.
translation.fr: Deux pas et je me suis évanoui.

translation.en: And the first thing I saw when I woke up was my dad,
translation.fr: Quand je suis revenu à moi, j'ai vu mon père.

translation.en: just standing right in front of me, looking stern.
translation.fr: Il était devant moi, le visage dur.

translation.en: What did he say?
He said I was out of the program.
He said I didn't deserve to be in a Jaeger.
translation.fr: que je méritais pas de piloter,

translation.en: Look, he said a lot of things.
A year later, my dad was gone.
translation.fr: Un an après, il était mort

translation.en: And I didn't get a chance to prove him wrong.
translation.fr: et j'ai pas pu lui prouver qu'il avait tort,

translation.en: More importantly, I didn’t get a chance to prove it to myself.
translation.fr: et j'ai pas pu lui prouver qu'il avait tort, ni me le prouver à moi-même.

translation.en: You listen to me.
Don't let what other people think of you define who you are.
translation.fr: laisse pas l'opinion des autres te définir.

translation.en: You won't like where that takes you. Do you understand?
translation.fr: T'aimeras pas ce que tu deviendras. Tu me suis ?

translation.en: And keep your head up.
And you might just be as good-looking as me in this type of situation.
translation.fr: pour avoir ce physique en toute circonstance.

translation.en: -[laughs] -Seriously.
This face is set up well. Beauty is a burden.
translation.fr: ce visage est harmonieux. La beauté est un fardeau.

translation.en: You'll be all right.
What?
Obsidian Fury has tech in it made by Shao Industries.
translation.fr: Obsidian Fury a des composants fabriqués par Shao.

translation.en: That's impossible. Jules and her team scanned every centimeter of that Jaeger.
translation.fr: Impossible. Jules et son équipe l'ont passé au crible.

translation.en: Insulating meta materials wound counter-clockwise in the shunt cabling.
translation.fr: Les métamatériaux isolants sont torsadés à gauche dans le câblage.

translation.en: Shao's the only company that winds them that way.
translation.fr: Shao est la seule boîte qui fait ça.

translation.en: Amara, are you sure about what you're telling me right now?
Yes.
Yeah. I stole a ton to make Scrapper.
translation.fr: J'en ai volé pour fabriquer Scrapper.

translation.en: I thought it might be important.
Yeah. Thank you.
Shao Industries? They don't even have a bio-division.
translation.fr: Shao Industries ? Ils n'ont pas de division biotech.

translation.en: Yeah, not that we know of.
Cabling could have been stolen, just like in Amara's Jaeger. We're gonna need more than that to connect Fury to Shao.
translation.fr: Ces câbles ont pu être volés. Ça suffit pas pour relier Fury à Shao.

translation.en: What about Newt? He'd have access to the internal records, the shipping manifests.
translation.fr: Newt aurait accès aux dossiers, aux manifestes d'expédition.

translation.en: All right, go see him. Keep a low profile.
I have a mission? Finally!
We'll take what we know to the Marshal.
The building's secure, ma'am.
No visitors without the proper credentials.
I don't want anyone interfering with deployment.
translation.fr: Personne ne doit perturber le déploiement.

translation.en: What is it?
I'll be in my office.
Okay.
This isn't fair.
[Jinhai] I'm sorry. You don't deserve this.
translation.fr: Je suis désolé, tu mérites pas ça.

translation.en: It was my fault.
This is on me.
The next Jaeger you build,
make it a big one.
[electronic voice] System online.
-And we have delivery at 100%, people. -System online.
translation.fr: Et nous avons un taux de livraison de 100 %, les amis.

translation.en: A hundred percent! That's the way that it's done, okay?
I told you we could do it, and we did it! [electronic voice] Malfunction.
translation.fr: Je vous avais dit qu'on y arriverait.

translation.en: I'm losing uplink to drone 375!
Why? Why?
Figure out why!
[Marshal Quan] We'll take what we know to the council in person.
Prep a transport.
-Give me a second. -[officer speaking Mandarin]
The Drones in the field are malfunctioning!
Stop the ones coming in from deploying!
Get to Gipsy! Go!
[over pa] All pilots, man your Jaegers and engage hostiles!
translation.fr: Pilotes, à vos jaegers et préparez-vous au combat !

translation.en: Okay, you got this.
You cool? Yeah, super cool. Just stay calm...
translation.fr: T'es cool ? Oui, super cool. Garde ton calme.

translation.en: Dr. Geiszler! Shao's looking for you.
I know! I'm heading up. I'm heading right...
Hermann. What are you doing here? How'd you get in here?
I do have PPDC credentials.
And besides, everyone else seems a little bit preoccupied with the killer drones your boss just set off!
translation.fr: et les gens se soucient surtout des drones tueurs de ta patronne !

translation.en: -She used you. -No.
She lured you with money and a fancy title. No. No way.
translation.fr: Elle t'a appâté avec un salaire et un titre,

translation.en: While you were basking in the glow, she took your research and she twisted it.
translation.fr: et tandis que tu savourais ça, elle a détourné tes recherches.

translation.en: Help me stop her, Newton. Help me save the world like old times.
translation.fr: Aide-moi à la stopper et à sauver de nouveau le monde.

translation.en: All right, technically, you were helping me last time. Let's get that straight.
translation.fr: C'était plutôt toi qui m'avais aidé, la dernière fois.

translation.en: Fine. Help me help you save the world.
translation.fr: Bien. Aide-moi à t'aider à sauver le monde, d'accord ?

translation.en: -What do you say? -I say...
translation.fr: Bien. Aide-moi à t'aider à sauver le monde, d'accord ? En fait... Ne tirez pas !

translation.en: I say... Don't shoot!
God damn it, why can't I get this language?
-What's happening? -Amara! Are those Jaegers?
No, they're drones from Shao Industries.
-What are they doing? -I don't know! They just went crazy!
Hey! Clear the deck now!
Get back to your quarters right now!
translation.fr: À vos quartiers, c'est un ordre !

translation.en: -Yes, sir! -Go, go, go!
Go! Get the hell out of here! Come on! Go, go!
Really?
Now?
Hermann!
Little help!
Next time, why don't you learn how to use a gun? Take that!
translation.fr: Apprends à te servir d'un flingue !

translation.en: Vile, vile individual!
-Thank you, Newton. -Yeah. I'd hug you if I didn't have a rule about public displays of affection.
translation.fr: Merci. Je t'étreindrais bien, mais je hais les effusions.

translation.en: -It's fine. -To hell with it.
Okay! All right. If you're done groping me? Let's take care of the drones, right? All right, good.
translation.fr: Cesse de me tripoter, on va s'occuper des drones.

translation.en: Shut down all systems! Now!
Everyone, get out of the lab or I will shoot you!
translation.fr: Que tout le monde sorte du labo

translation.en: -I will shoot you twice! -[speaking in Mandarin]
translation.fr: ou je vous descends, deux fois.

translation.en: Always knew you'd go nuts!
You're officially fired! Get out!
What do we do? How do we stop this?
There's a back door, Hermann.
translation.fr: - Il y a une porte dérobée. - Où ?

translation.en: -To what? -To the drone subroutine.
translation.fr: - Il y a une porte dérobée. - Où ? Sur la sous-routine des drones.

translation.en: I added a subroutine just in case I wanna get in here and poke around down the road.
translation.fr: J'ai ajouté une sous-routine pour avoir accès au programme.

translation.en: Oh, sneaky bastard.
I know, right?
What did you just do?
What I've been planning the last 10 years.
translation.fr: Ce que je planifie depuis 10 ans.

translation.en: I'm ending the world.
Where the hell are my pilots?!
Sitrep!
Breaches detected, multiple locations! It's the Drones, sir!
translation.fr: - Au rapport ! - Brèches détectées. Ce sont les drones.

translation.en: [in English] All pilots,
breaches detected.
Drones in the field are opening multiple breaches across the Pacific Rim!
translation.fr: Des drones ouvrent des brèches sur toute la côte.

translation.en: Why?
Why would you do this?
Why would I do this? Hmm.
Well...
I guess I wouldn't. Not normally, not really my style.
translation.fr: je le ferais pas en temps normal, c'est pas mon genre.

translation.en: Yeah, no, I don't know, maybe I hate you all
translation.fr: J'en ai peut-être assez d'être traité

translation.en: for treating me like an insignificant, little joke of a man.
Maybe that's why he did it, Hermann. I did it.
translation.fr: Il craque peut-être. Moi, je craque.

translation.en: See... [chuckles]
There you go.
There's the problem.
I'm just not feeling totally myself these days.
translation.fr: Je ne suis plus moi-même, ces derniers temps.

translation.en: You.
Precursors.
Very good, Hermann, you figured it out. And as usual, a step behind.
translation.fr: T'as deviné, Hermann. Comme toujours, avec un temps de retard.

translation.en: Newton.
-You are a good man. -No. Hermann.
-You must stop. -No, there's no point in fighting them. -You must fight back. -I'm not strong enough, Hermann.
translation.fr: Il faut les repousser, je t'en prie !

translation.en: -Please. You must! -I am not strong enough.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas assez fort.

translation.en: He is not strong enough!
None of you are strong enough!
translation.fr: Aucun de vous n'est assez fort !

translation.en: I'm sorry, Hermann.
They're in my head.
Let him go!
You're not going to ruin my life's work.
Oh, hey, boss.
The hell are you doing here? I told you to get to quarters!
translation.fr: Vous deviez retourner à vos quartiers !

translation.en: All the doors are blocked!
What do we do?
How did you do it without me knowing?
I mean, 38% of your company is fully automated.
translation.fr: Voyons, 38 % de votre société est automatisée.

translation.en: It really wasn't very hard to reallocate a little over here
translation.fr: C'était un jeu d'enfant de réallouer de l'espace par ici

translation.en: and a little over there. And slip in a little Kaiju surprise without you noticing.
translation.fr: et aussi par là, et d'y cacher un kaiju-surprise.

translation.en: Especially since you always thought...
you were the smartest person in the room.
In about a second, I'm going to be.
[Hermann] Stop! Wait, wait, wait. Newt's not in control of himself!
translation.fr: Non, attendez ! Il n'est pas lui-même.

translation.en: It isn't him! It's the Precursors.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas lui. Les Précurseurs ont dû l'infecter quand on a dérivé.

translation.en: They must've infected his mind when we drifted with the Kaiju.
translation.fr: Les Précurseurs ont dû l'infecter quand on a dérivé.

translation.en: Shut up! [speaking in Mandarin]
Security, find and detain Dr. Geiszler. If he tries to resist, put a bullet in his head.
translation.fr: Sécurité, arrêtez le Dr Geiszler. S'il résiste, tuez-le.

translation.en: Stay here! We're gonna try and get to Gipsy.
translation.fr: Bougez pas, on va rejoindre Gipsy.

translation.en: You ready for this?
No! You?
-No. On three. -Great.
One, two...
[Hermann] Hello? Anyone there?
Gottlieb?
Jake! Thank God!
We're under attack. You need to force Liwen
-to shut down the drones! -It isn't her.
translation.fr: à les désactiver. Elle n'y est pour rien, c'est Newt.

translation.en: It isn't Liwen. It was Newt.
translation.fr: Elle n'y est pour rien, c'est Newt.

translation.en: The Precursors, they've infected him.
They're controlling his mind.
Gottlieb, can you get him to disable the drones?
No. He got away.
-Gottlieb, shut them down. -[Liwen speaking in Mandarin]
I've penetrated the subroutine.
It's trying to lock you out.
Feedback loop.
[Jake] Gottlieb, what the hell is going on? Gottlieb!
Gottlieb, shut them down or we're gonna die!
translation.fr: Faites vite ou on est morts !

translation.en: Shut them down!
Liwen has disabled the drones.
The breaches are closed. I repeat, the breaches are closed.
translation.fr: les brèches sont refermées. Je répète, les brèches sont refermées.

translation.en: "Oh, no" what?
Three Kaiju have gotten through.
South Korea, Russian coast, and East China Sea.
translation.fr: Corée du Sud, côte russe et mer de Chine orientale.

translation.en: Two Cat-Fours and a Cat-Five. [Jake] Copy that.
translation.fr: - Deux catégories 4 et un catégorie 5. - Bien reçu.

translation.en: Get back to the dome.
We're gonna need all the help we can get.
-You girls okay? -[all] Yes, ma'am.
All right, what do we got?
The reports are still coming in, but drones took out Jaegers and Shatterdomes across the Rim.
translation.fr: Les drones ont détruit des jaegers et plusieurs dômes.

translation.en: All right. How many Jaegers do we have here?
Operational? Gipsy Avenger, barely.
translation.fr: - En état ? Gipsy Avenger. - C'est tout ?

translation.en: Okay. We need more Jaegers up and running or this is gonna be a short fight.
translation.fr: Il en faut plus si on veut gagner.

translation.en: Even if we can, all of our other pilots are either dead or severely injured.
translation.fr: Les autres pilotes sont morts ou blessés.

translation.en: One disaster at a time. Let's just focus on those Jaegers.
translation.fr: Un désastre à la fois : d'abord, les jaegers.

translation.en: Smallie, come over here.
I need you to help Jules with the repairs. Can you do that?
translation.fr: Tu peux aider Jules à réparer ?

translation.en: I thought I was kicked out.
I'm kicking you back in.
She's pretty good at turning junk into Jaegers.
You good with that?
Hell yeah.
[Jake] All right. We got a lot of work to do
and not a lot of time.
We got incoming!
I brought some help!
Hakuja, Shrikethorn,
translation.fr: Hakuja, Shrikethorn et le grand costaud, Raijin.

translation.en: and the big fella, Raijin.
translation.fr: Shrikethorn et le grand costaud, Raijin.

translation.en: I took the liberty of assigning the designations.
translation.fr: Je me suis permis de leur donner des noms.

translation.en: Well, the spiky guy and the big idiot are moving away from the cities and towards the ocean.
translation.fr: Le hérissé et le gros bêta retournent vers l'océan.

translation.en: What does that mean?
Maybe they're trying to link up with Hakuja in the East China Sea.
translation.fr: Peut-être pour rejoindre Hakuja en mer de Chine orientale.

translation.en: Yeah, I bet Newt would know what they're up to,
translation.fr: Newt nous dirait ce qu'ils mijotent

translation.en: if we can get it out of him.
Yeah, we'd have to find him first.
Any Jaegers closer to those Kaiju than us?
translation.fr: Il y a des jaegers dans ces zones ?

translation.en: What was left of the Chin-do and Sakhalinsk domes tried to intercept. Emphasis on "tried."
translation.fr: Ceux de Chin-do et Sakhalinsk ont tenté en vain de les intercepter.

translation.en: I'm afraid we're on our own.
[Nate] There's gotta be something here. Something in the East China Sea.
translation.fr: Il doit y avoir quelque chose en mer de Chine orientale.

translation.en: Maybe that's not where they're headed.
Pull up a map of Kaiju movement from the war.
translation.fr: Affichez leurs trajets durant la guerre.

translation.en: Pushing data to main display.
What, do you know something we don't?
You said we need to understand our enemy's objective
translation.fr: Tu dis qu'on doit comprendre le but ennemi

translation.en: to know we've beaten them.
What if the Kaiju weren't blindly attacking our cities during the war?
translation.fr: Et si les kaijus avaient un plan durant la guerre

translation.en: What if we were just in their way?
translation.fr: et qu'on avait gêné leur avancée ?

translation.en: Right here.
Mount Fuji, Japan.
Extrapolate for Hakuja, Shrikethorn and Raijin.
translation.fr: Extrapolez pour Hakuja, Shrikethorn et Raijin.

translation.en: Mount Fuji? But why?
Rare earth elements.
Mount Fuji is a volcano rich in rare earth elements.
translation.fr: Le mont Fuji est un volcan très riche en éléments de terres rares

translation.en: Kaiju blood reacts extremely violently with rare earth elements
translation.fr: en éléments de terres rares auxquels le sang de kaiju réagit violemment.

translation.en: is the basis of my fuel-thruster experiments. Excuse me.
translation.fr: C'est la base de mes expériences sur les propulseurs.

translation.en: -Whoa. That sounds bad. That's bad, right? -Very.
translation.fr: - Ça a l'air grave. C'est grave ? - Très.

translation.en: Mount Fuji's active. A geological pressure point.
translation.fr: Le mont Fuji est actif, c'est un point triple.

translation.en: Based on the blood to mass ratio of the Kaiju,
translation.fr: Au vu du rapport masse/sang d'un kaiju,

translation.en: the reaction would cause a cascade event,
igniting the Ring of Fire around the Pacific Rim.
translation.fr: la ceinture de feu du Pacifique.

translation.en: Billions of tons of toxic gas and ash will spew into the atmosphere,
translation.fr: Des milliards de tonnes de gaz toxiques gagneraient l'atmosphère,

translation.en: wiping out all life.
[Liwen] And finish terraforming the Earth
for the Precursors.
We can't let them reach Mount Fuji.
I'm gonna check with Jules for Jaeger repairs.
translation.fr: Je vais voir où en est Jules.

translation.en: Even if we had a hundred Jaegers, there's no way to intercept in time.
translation.fr: Même avec 100 jaegers, on n'arriverait pas à temps.

translation.en: What about your thruster pods?
Oh, no, no, no. They're not ready.
Can they be?
Well, in theory, maybe, with your help.
translation.fr: En principe, oui, si vous m'aidez.

translation.en: Gottlieb, what does that mean, "in theory"?
Today,
it means yes.
Saber Athena, Guardian Bravo and Bracer Phoenix are good to go.
translation.fr: On a Saber Athena, Guardian Bravo et Bracer Phoenix.

translation.en: It's not a lot to work with.
Liwen can patch some Fury tech into Gipsy that might help.
translation.fr: Liwen a équipé Gipsy de techno Fury.

translation.en: -Prep everything we got for deployment. -Okay.
translation.fr: On déploie tout ce qu'on a.

translation.en: Don't get yourself killed.
You either.
Well, that's confusing.
Let's just stay focused.
We got four Jaegers against two Category-Fours and a Fiver.
translation.fr: On a quatre jaegers pour trois kaijus.

translation.en: It's better than just Gipsy.
We still need pilots.
We have them.
Oh, shit.
If my dad was here, he'd probably give you a big speech.
translation.fr: Mon père vous aurait fait un grand discours

translation.en: Make you feel invincible.
I'm not my father.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas mon père,

translation.en: I'm not a hero like he was.
translation.fr: je ne suis pas un héros comme lui,

translation.en: Like Raleigh Becket
and Mako Mori.
But they didn't start out that way.
translation.fr: Mais ils ne sont pas nés héros,

translation.en: They started out as cadets, just like you.
translation.fr: ils ont d'abord été cadets, comme vous.

translation.en: We remember them as giants because they stood tall.
translation.fr: Ils nous ont marqués par leur bravoure,

translation.en: Because they stood together.
It doesn't matter who your parents are,
where you came from, who believed in you and who didn't.
translation.fr: votre parcours, qui a cru en vous ou non,

translation.en: We are a family now.
And we are Earth's last defense.
This is our time, this is our chance to make a difference.
translation.fr: Le moment est venu de changer le cours des choses.

translation.en: Now let's mount up and get it done!
translation.fr: Alors en place et au boulot !

translation.en: Do you understand?
[all] Yes, sir!
Jaeger pilots, do you understand?
Now help me save the world.
Let's do this.
Initiating neural handshake.
Establishing neural link.
[Amara's father] Amara, jump in there!
Neural handshake strong and steady.
So, how does it feel to be in a real Jaeger?
translation.fr: Alors, ça fait quoi d'être dans un vrai jaeger ?

translation.en: Bigger's not bad.
All right, all Jaegers sound off. Go-no-go for launch.
Guardian Bravo, go.
Saber Athena, go.
Bracer Phoenix, let's go already.
Copy that.
Command, we are go for launch.
Roger, Gipsy Avenger.
Ignition in 10 seconds.
Nine,
eight,
seven, six,
five, four,
three, two,
one.
Ignition!
[electronic voice] Warning.
Exceeding structural limits.
What the hell?
My grandmother used to play it for me. Keeps me calm.
translation.fr: Ma grand-mère me passait ça pour me calmer.

translation.en: What about me? Not calm, man, not calm.
translation.fr: Et moi, alors ? Ça me calme pas du tout.

translation.en: I knew it would work. [exhales]
Gipsy to Command. Targets acquired.
[Hermann] Roger that, Gipsy.
Everyone in the city is secured in underground shelters.
translation.fr: La population a rejoint les abris.

translation.en: You are clear to engage.
Solid copy. Going hot.
Bracer Phoenix, on me. We'll take Raijin.
translation.fr: On attaque. Bracer Phoenix, on prend Raijin.

translation.en: Roger that, Gipsy.
Saber Athena, Guardian Bravo,
-you take the other two. -Copy that.
It's our turn to save the world.
-Let's hope so. -[Nate] On my mark.
Three, two, one... Mark!
Fire!
[Hermann] Gipsy, Raijin's face plates
are absorbing the hits and throwing the energy back at you!
translation.fr: absorbe les coups et renvoie l'énergie.

translation.en: Let's see it absorb this!
How many buildings can this thing take?
Shrikethorn inbound!
translation.fr: - Attaque de Shrikethorn ! - Venez nous aider !

translation.en: Hey, guys, we could use a little help over here! Right now!
translation.fr: - Attaque de Shrikethorn ! - Venez nous aider ! Fissa !

translation.en: Copy that, Saber. Vik, take out Shrikethorn!
translation.fr: Bien reçu, Saber. Vik, canarde Shrikethorn.

translation.en: On it.
Saber Athena, Guardian Bravo coming to assist!
Activating arc whip!
[Suresh] Yeah, that's right! You better run!
These things ain't that tough.
Bracer Phoenix, watch your six!
Hostile inbound!
[Viktoria] Copy that!
Okay, we're going with giant robots again.
All right, real original, guys.
I'm not impressed.
I am not impressed.
We've got movement! Multiple hostiles, three kilometers southeast.
translation.fr: Activité. Plusieurs ennemis, 3 km au sud-est.

translation.en: Liwen! Are you reading this?
That's one of my automated factories.
translation.fr: C'est une de mes usines automatisées.

translation.en: It was Newt. He's in Tokyo.
translation.fr: C'est un coup de Newt. Il est à Tokyo.

translation.en: Locating his position.
Hostiles, one klick away and closing fast!
translation.fr: Ennemis à un kilomètre, à pleine vitesse.

translation.en: All Jaegers, brace for contact.
Disengage and brace for contact!
Let's go, all right, go, go, go! Go, baby, go, baby!
Where they going?
Well, he's pretty big.
All Jaegers, advance and fire everything you've got on my command!
translation.fr: Jaegers, avancez et envoyez la sauce. À mon signal !

translation.en: Go!
Guardian, stand down!
We've got this!
Negative! That's an order!
Freaking teenagers!
-Go for the eyes! -Which ones?
All of them.
Ilya, Suresh, report.
Do you copy? Come on, guys, sound off!
translation.fr: Vous me recevez ? Allez, les gars, répondez !

translation.en: [Nate] Guardian Bravo, give me a sitrep. You guys okay?
translation.fr: Guardian Bravo, ça donne quoi ? Vous allez bien ?

translation.en: Guardian's down.
I'm pinned in the Conn-Pod.
translation.fr: Je suis bloqué dans le cockpit.

translation.en: Suresh?
Suresh didn't make it, sir.
Copy, Guardian.
You just stay put, and we'll send you help as soon as we can.
translation.fr: Bouge pas, on t'enverra de l'aide.

translation.en: Bracer Phoenix, report.
You guys okay?
We're a little banged up, but we're still in the fight.
translation.fr: On est un peu amochés, mais debout.

translation.en: [Renata] Us, too, Saber.
I mean, Saber Athena, sir!
Saber, Bracer, prepare to intercept at the following coordinates.
translation.fr: Saber et Bracer, allez à ces cordonnées.

translation.en: Let's finish this. Move your ass. And don't be late.
Copy. Bracer Phoenix hauling ass!
translation.fr: Bien reçu. Bracer Phoenix se magne le train.

translation.en: Gipsy to Command,
do you have a tactical scan of the hostile? Assessing data from their sensors.
translation.fr: - Vous avez scanné l'ennemi ? - Examen en cours.

translation.en: We have it, Gipsy, but it's still compiling.
[Jake] No time. Can you locate the brains?
translation.fr: Pas le temps. Localisez les cerveaux.

translation.en: Hostile's central brain mass is heavily armored. Your weapons won't be able to penetrate.
What about a secondary brain? This son of a bitch have one of those?
translation.fr: Ce salopard a un cerveau secondaire ?

translation.en: Hostile has three secondary brains.
translation.fr: Notre ennemi en a même trois, un pour chaque composant kaiju.

translation.en: One for each component Kaiju.
translation.fr: en a même trois, un pour chaque composant kaiju.

translation.en: Sending intel.
Package confirmed for Saber Athena.
Confirmed for Bracer Phoenix.
All right, team, follow my lead and stay alert!
Fire up some of that Fury tech Liwen grabbed us.
Read my mind, partner.
[electronic voice] Damage detected.
Eject! Eject!
All pilots eject!
[electronic voice] Warning. Neural load exceeding limit.
-Nate! Nate! -Warning.
[Jake] Nate, stay with me! Stay with me!
-Get up! Nate! -[Nate coughing]
Pilot down!
Get up from that, you pile of junk!
translation.fr: Tu t'en relèveras pas, tas de ferraille !

translation.en: Liwen! Is there anything you can do to help?
I need more time!
We don't have any!
translation.fr: Si l'ennemi atteint le mont Fuji...

translation.en: -If the hostile reaches Mount Fuji... -[Jake] Understood.
translation.fr: Si l'ennemi atteint le mont Fuji... Compris.

translation.en: [panting] Not gonna let that happen.
Jake, you can't operate Gipsy without a co-pilot!
translation.fr: Vous ne pourrez pas sans copilote !

translation.en: The strain will tear your mind apart!
translation.fr: Votre tête explosera sous la pression.

translation.en: What do we do now?
-Regroup with the others. -Amara!
[Amara] Gipsy Avenger,
this is Amara Namani.
Stand by for assist.
Amara, don't.
-You won't make it. -I'm gonna!
Don't! Don't!
I told you.
Since when do I listen?
[Nate] Amara, you're up.
What are you doing?
Getting the hell out of your way.
translation.fr: Je te laisse le champ libre.

translation.en: You got this, brother.
[electronic voice] Ejection sequence initiated.
Ejection sequence successful.
You ready for this, smallie?
One way to find out.
Stand by, Command. Initiating neural handshake.
translation.fr: Tenez-vous prêt, PC. Jonction neuronale initialisée.

translation.en: [electronic voice] Establishing neural link.
Yeah, that was supposed to be epic,
translation.fr: C'était pas aussi épique que prévu.

translation.en: -but it wasn't. -Definitely not.
[electronic voice] Warning. Cascade failure. Multiple systems offline.
translation.fr: Danger. Échecs en série. Circuits déconnectés.

translation.en: -Reboot. -Okay, I'm on it.
[Hermann] Command to Gipsy.
Hostile is two kilometers from the summit of Mount Fuji and closing fast!
translation.fr: l'ennemi est à 2 km du sommet du mont Fuji et progresse vite.

translation.en: Gottlieb, do you have enough fuel left in your thrusters
translation.fr: Gottlieb, il reste de quoi nous propulser
