translation.en: to launch us into the atmosphere?
-The atmosphere? -Yeah.
Possibly, but there won't be enough to slow your reentry.
translation.fr: Mais on pourra pas freiner votre rentrée.

translation.en: [Jake] We don't need to slow down.
We're gonna drop Gipsy right on top of that thing.
translation.fr: on larguera Gipsy sur ce monstre.

translation.en: I just ejected my escape pod.
Yeah. We'll have to use mine.
Jake, there's only one thruster with enough fuel remaining.
translation.fr: Un seul propulseur a du carburant.

translation.en: Sending location. All right, checking.
We're too far away.
We're not gonna make it.
[Liwen] Gipsy Avenger, transport inbound.
Remote systems are online. Sending help!
translation.fr: Circuits à distance réparés, envoi de renforts.

translation.en: Scrapper!
[Liwen] I've located the thruster pod!
Stand by!
[Jake] Come on, come on! Move them little legs!
The thruster's way too strong,
there's no way we can hold on to it!
[Jake] Liwen, what do you got?
I can weld it to your hand.
translation.fr: Je le soude à votre main.

translation.en: I upgraded Scrapper's weapons. Nice. I was actually gonna do that.
translation.fr: - J'ai modernisé l'armement de Scrapper. - J'allais le faire.

translation.en: No, you wasn't.
Yes, I was.
We only got one shot at this. Yeah! Then let's make it count.
translation.fr: - On n'aura qu'un essai. - Faudra le transformer !

translation.en: -I'm stuck! -[alarm blaring]
Stay there! You're an extra ton we can drop on that thing!
translation.fr: Ça fera une tonne de plus sur le kaiju !

translation.en: -She's coming apart! -Almost there!
We're drifting off course! Use the plasma cannon!
Disengaging safety protocol!
[electronic voice] Plasma cannon engaged.
Warning. Exceeding structural limits.
It's working!
[electronic voice] Structural failure.
Hold on!
-Come on! Come on! -[beeping]
Target locked!
Jake, Amara, you need to eject!
Disconnect!
Amara, disconnect!
I will catch you! I promise!
Come on!
-I've got you. -[panting]
Gipsy to Command, we're getting the hell out of here!
translation.fr: Gipsy à PC, on se tire d'ici !

translation.en: [electronic voice] Escape pod failure.
I'm sorry, smallie.
For what?
We got to save the world.
Your dad would be proud.
Scrapper!
-Hurry! -Get over here! Hurry up!
Move! We have to go!
Twenty kilometers to impact. Get out of there!
translation.fr: Vingt kilomètres avant impact. Sortez de là !

translation.en: Go! Go!
We're in! Close the door!
-Hang on! -I am hanging on!
Hang tighter!
Okay, you know what? Plan B. Always a Plan B.
translation.fr: Et maintenant, plan B. Il en faut toujours un.

translation.en: Anyone who's listening,
this is Ranger Lambert.
Be advised, we just caught ourselves a Newt.
[Jake chuckles] Copy that.
There he is. I'm glad you're still okay, man.
translation.fr: Te revoilà. Content que tu sois entier.

translation.en: [Nate panting] You, too, brother. I knew you could do it.
translation.fr: Toi aussi. Je savais que tu y arriverais.

translation.en: Well, I had a lot of help.
Nice work, Ranger Namani.
Thank you, sir.
Never seen snow before.
translation.fr: Je n'avais jamais vu de neige.

translation.en: So out of all the things to notice right now, you're noticing snow?
Big, dead Kaiju is right there.
translation.fr: Il y a un gros kaiju mort...

translation.en: -Okay, okay, all right. -And I'm not sure if you're...
Is this the part where you're gonna give me one of those big, dumb speeches?
translation.fr: Tu vas me faire un autre discours débile ?

translation.en: Did everyone think it was dumb, or is that just your opinion...
translation.fr: Qui l'a trouvé débile, à part toi ?

translation.en: Just be honest. How many times did you practice that in front of the mirror?
It was motivational. You can be whoever you wanna be.
translation.fr: Je vous motivais. Tu peux devenir...

translation.en: -Okay. Now you wanna play that? -Fire!
-I'm a natural at this. -No, you're not a natural because...
translation.fr: - C'est inné chez moi. - Tu parles !

translation.en: Oh! Give me a break. I've never done this before!
There you go. Boom!
[Amara] We did it!
You think this is over, huh? You think you've saved your crappy little world?
translation.fr: Vous croyez que c'est fini, que votre monde minable est sauvé ?

translation.en: We're gonna keep coming!
We are never going to stop and sooner or later
translation.fr: On ne s'arrêtera pas, et tôt ou tard,

translation.en: [distorted] your luck is going to run out!
Nah.
The things in your head?
The Precursors?
Tell them we're not afraid.
Tell them, next time, they won't need to worry about coming for us.
translation.fr: La prochaine fois, pas la peine qu'ils nous attaquent,

translation.en: Because we're gonna come for them.
